alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:06PM EDT until April 10 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Montezuma affecting Sumter, Dooly and Macon Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Montezuma...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River near Montezuma. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and extensive flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 26. The access road to Georges Boat Landing is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 20 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
